title: The NOW Christmas Collection
description:
This is a compilation of some of the Christmas albums released by the famed 'NOW That's What I Call A ...' series from 2000 to 2012. None of them are ripped by me but I have downloaded them from various torrent sources. All CDs are ripped at 128kbps and all mp3s are tagged. I am giving below only the album list. Please check the included NFO for detailed tracks list:

01. Now That's What I Call Christmas! 1 (2001)(2 CDs / 36 tracks)
02. Now That's What I Call Christmas! 2 (2003)(2 CDs / 36 tracks)
03. Now That's What I Call Christmas! 3 (2006)(2 CDs / 36 tracks)
04. Now That's What I Call Christmas! 4 (2010)(2 CDs / 36 tracks)
05. Now Christmas 4 (Canadian Edition)(2009)(1 CD / 15 tracks)
06. Now Christmas 5 (Canadian Edition)(2011)(1 CD / 17 tracks)
07. Now That's What I Call a Country Christmas (2009)(2 CDs / 29 tracks)
08. Now That's What I Call Today's Christmas 2012 (1 CD / 18 tracks)
09. Now The Christmas Album (2000)(2 CDs / 40 tracks)
10. The Essential NOW That's What I Call Christmas (2008)(1 CD / 25 tracks)
11. NOW That's What I Call Christmas (2012)(3 CDs / 63 tracks)

11 Albums | 19 CDs | 351 Tracks | 128kbps | mp3
